metadata.description: The biggest name in fiction, GEORGE RR MARTIN, opens his story vault as we adapt a tale of dark fantasy to comics for the first time with In The House of the Worm.  Beneath a ruined city on a forgotten planet lies a world of plots and revenge.  When Annelyn is embarrassed in front of his noble friends by the Meatbringer, he sets forth a devious plan that is meant to gain vengeance.  But the terrible truth of the dire White Worm turns his ploy into folly in terrible fashion.  Join a master storyteller as he spins a uniquely mysterious tale and reveals new worlds of wonder and horror.  From the creator of A Game of Thrones, a new vision of fantastic adventure!
metadata.name: George R.R. Martin's The House of the Worm
